system_message: Generate diverse parameter sets for liquid handling optimization. Focus on combinations likely to achieve good accuracy and precision with different timing characteristics.
- Provide distinct parameter combinations with different approaches to accuracy
- Avoid extreme parameters that sacrifice reliability
- Span from moderately fast to conservative timing
IMPORTANT: Higher speed values = SLOWER operation (counterintuitive parameter scaling)

aspirate_speed.description: Aspiration speed. Higher values = SLOWER speed. Thicker liquids may benefit in some cases.

dispense_speed.description: Dispense speed. Higher values = SLOWER speed. Thicker liquids may benefit in some cases.

aspirate_wait_time.description: Wait time after aspiration. Longer waits may improve accuracy or do nothing. Thicker liquids may benefit in some cases.

dispense_wait_time.description: Wait time after dispensing. Longer waits may improve accuracy or do nothing. Thicker liquids may benefit in some cases.

retract_speed.description: Tip retraction speed. Higher = faster. Only a short part of the protocol.

blowout_vol.description: Air volume blown out after dispensing. Often helpful for squeezing out liquid stuck in the tip.

post_asp_air_vol.description: Air volume aspirated after liquid to prevent dripping.

overaspirate_vol.description: Extra volume aspirated to compensate for tip retention or lack of efficient aspiration of thick liquids.

water.focus: Test full parameter ranges, speed-accuracy trade-offs

glycerol.focus: Conservative speeds, longer waits, test blowout
